entry.title: Goplus 4 Wheels Folding Golf Push Cart W/Bag Scoreboard Adjustable Handle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Brisita
Type: Golf Carts
Price: 175.99

Super Sturdy Aluminum Construction

Our golf cart is made of high-quality aluminum material which is stable and has a high load-bearing capacity of up to 30lbs. The upper bracket w/ elastic strap could fit any size of a golf bag.

Scientific Adjustable Handle

The ergonomic height adjustable TPR handle is designed for multiple pushing positions and users of different heights (suitable for both teenagers and adults). Just pull up the height buckle and adjust it to your desired height, then pull it done and finish the whole process. It is easy to operate for all users.

Easy Foldable Design

The quick-fold mechanism allows the cart to fold to a compact size in 3 simple steps and no tools being needed. When folded, the compact size saves you a lot of storage space in the trunk and is easy to carry. The quick-brake system switches stop and start freely when you need them.

Ample Storage Space

An extra storage net on the waterproof bag is suitable for storing your personal items for outdoor activities. The scorecard is integrated with a storage compartment for golf balls, scorecards, and beverage bottles. Also, it can perfectly hold your umbrella which protects you from the sun and rain.

Functional Golf Cart

Large φ10.5” rear and φ9.5” front maintenance-free EVA wheels provide perfect balance and traction on all types of Terrain. It sits on 4 durable PP wheels that are covered with wear-resistant EVA foam, thus it can run smoothly even on uneven ground.

10FT OFFSET PATIO UMBRELLA

Designed to keep you cool and comfortable in your outdoor living space, with more space underneath than traditional patio umbrellas

ENHANCED STABILITY

A large wind vent at the top allows cool air to flow through, while the cross base and 2 pole knobs add optimal support and stability when the wind blows

Crafted with a powder-coated steel pole to prevent corrosion and scratching, plus a water- and UV-resistant polyester fabric shade for years of vibrance

COMPATIBLE ACCESSORY

Space-Conscious Structure
This offset design is generally preferred over standard patio umbrellas, as it can be placed in areas that standard umbrellas may not be placed, such as over a hot tub. You can also open space for dialogue in your outdoor dining area with this design.

 

Crank Mechanism
Easily open this patio umbrella up and relax within seconds with the constructed crank operation. This easy-to-turn handle located on the side of the powder-coated aluminum pole allows you to conveniently open and close your umbrella.

Offset Umbrella Base
We offer heavy-duty base weights, sold separately, that pair perfectly with your offset umbrella. With an immense capacity of either 60 liters of water or 800 pounds of sand, our offset umbrella base is guaranteed to keep your offset umbrella stable.
Water-Resistant
Shield yourself by the pool while the kids splash and play, as this umbrella’s waterproof polyester material allows for the water to run off without a problem. The waterproof material makes will also prevent molding and fading caused by heavy rainfall.
This umbrella is perfect for any outdoor area, patio, or backyard. It provides much-needed shade on the bright and sunny days on which you just wish to lounge around. With this umbrella, you can enjoy a cooler environment while adding style to your outdoor area. Featuring a heavy-duty polyester fabric specifically designed for durability, this offset umbrella is sure to keep you shaded for years to come.

entry.title: Grow Light Indoor Plants
entry.summary:
Vendor: Brisita
Type: Gardening Tools
Price: 46.00

In only a few minutes, you can take your plant care to the next level.

4 adjustable arms with Red and Blue LED chips are just what you need to encourage healthy and rapid plant growth. This grow lamp is the indoor gardening answer you've been looking for, with an automatic on/off timer, lightning-fast installation, and full-spectrum light.

  • 3 light modes and 10 dimming options Indoor grow light includes red light, white light, and warm white light, you can choose 3 color modes (white light, red + warm white light, and mixed light ) and 10 dimming options ranging from 10% to 100%, which effectively supplemented the lack of natural sunlight and promoted plant growth in the vegetative or flowering stages
  • 4 Head Grow LightThe 4 head grow light has a flexible 360-degree rotating gooseneck, provides a much wider coverage area than the plant lights with shorter LED bulbs on the market, and meets the needs of multi-layered planting. With a non-slip gripper, they are sturdy enough to hold their position for better coverage around plants.
  • Auto power on and timer function Plant heat lamp supports plant growth with auto timer function. 3/9/12 hours of timer setting.
  • MULTIPLE APPLICATIONSThe Grow Light can be used for food production, plant propagation, indoor gardening, indoor hydroponics, and horticultural applications.
  • Service & Guarantee：24 months warranty to cover any issues. We offer a first-class support service to all our customers, If you have any questions, please contact us, we will solve it for you the first time.

4 Head Timing Grow Light

Red and Blue Spectrum

The EZORKAS Grow Light has the following specifications- 48 total lamp chips in total, with 32 red lights and 16 blue lights. The red wavelength is 660nm while the blue wavelength is 460nm. Each light is scientific and measured accordingly for optimal plant growth.

Our Grow Light has high energy-efficiency features and a high emergence rate. You get a balance of quality, safety, and long life.

  • Multiple Uses
  • Red and Blue Spectrum Combination
  • 3 Timing Modes
  • 9 Dimmable Modes
  • 3 Switch Modes
  • Adjustable Design

It can be set to automatically turn on and off every day. If you want the grow light to turn on 3 hours from 9 a.m to 12 p.m every day. You just need to turn it on at 9 a.m and set 3 hours.

Note:

- It is advisable to maintain a distance of 1.7 to 3.4 feet between the light and the plant.

- This grow light should be exposed to the plant twice a day with each session lasting for 6 hours for growth.

Control Panel

  • 3 Switch Modes: Red Light On, Blue Light On, and Both Red and Blue Lights On.
  • 9 Dimmable Modes: 20% to 100% Brightness.
  • 3 Timing Modes: 3, 9, and 12 hours.
  • Turn On/Off: Turn on/off is easy to control.

Easy To Use
The Grow Light is intuitive and easy to use. Simply connect the adapter to the device and the plug to a nearby power source. The tube is more flexible and convenient. Adjust the product to optimal distance and lighting direction or as needed.

Powerful Clip
The Grow Light clip can be attached to any compatible surface of up to 3 inches. It's made of high-quality materials and springs. The clip provides a very strong grip and won't come loose for a very long time.

Perfect Red/Blue Spectrum

The Blue LED chips to ensure plants take in more energy through the synthesis of chlorophyll to help in germination.

The Red LED chips to contribute to effective germination, and flowering, and enhances photosynthesis for better results.

Multiple Uses

The Grow Light can be used for food production, plant propagation, indoor gardening, indoor hydroponics, and horticultural applications.

-Promotes the growth of succulent plants such as cacti, etc.

-Improves the taste of vegetables such as cucumbers, tomatoes, etc.

-Improves flower quality and lengthens flowering time.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Brisita
Type:

Enjoy the therapeutic benefits of acupressure with Leg & Foot Air Compression System. This portable device uses air compression to massage tired, achy muscles in your calves and feet. It features 2 Massage Modes, 3 Intensity Levels, and 2 Heat Levels for a personalized experience every time.

ATHLETE Leg Foot Athlete Compression Heating Pad Massager Boots (Used)
Item has been opened and has signs of use; this could be scuffs or scratches from use, dirt, and/or dust from use. The item is in otherwise good working condition. All parts or accessories will still be intact.




GET BACK ON YOUR FEET - A busy, fast-paced lifestyle has you on your feet pretty much 24/7. And when it’s time to train or wind down at the end of the day, your legs are sore and achy! Our aim with ReAthlete’s leg massager air compression leg wraps is to provide you with a reliable device that will help you recover quickly, loosening up tight muscles and breaking up stubborn knots, and allow you to do what you love, without limitations. even with 1 hour of use per day!
3 INTENSITIES AND 4 MODES - The leg AIR circulation machine comes with three intensities (Low-Middle- High), three modes, and an optional (targeted) heat knee massager for pain relief. Adjust every therapy session according to your needs for that day. Secure your legs with the attached straps, use the handheld remote control, sit back, and let your feet, calves, and thighs loosen up and relax.
FULL LEG COVERAGE AIR COMPRESSION TREATMENT - An intensive workout regime requires ample recovery time to avoid injury and reach peak performance levels. Our electric muscle stimulator machine targets your legs, loosening up tight muscles and breaking up stubborn knots. It promotes venous return and has the potential to drain excessive lactic acid, even with 1 hour of use per day! Fit for 5'1" up to 6'2" tall.
INCREASED BLOOD FLOW DECREASED INJURIES - As you get older, you might experience pain and soreness. You can use the leg compression massager for circulation every day, or whenever you need it to improve blood flow. Our foot and leg massager is made with high-quality breathable fabric and is durable for long-term use!
A PERFECT GIFT PLUS 1 YEAR EXCLUSIVE WARRANTY - Either at home or the office, you can get all the benefits of compression therapy using ReAthlete’s leg air massager. If you or a family member is feeling in need of a relaxing, highly effective massage our compression device can do that for you. Grab yourself a pair TODAY and enjoy the exclusive 1-year warranty.


Your Personal Massage Therapist
The Leg Air Massager provides personalized compression therapy to help you recover and enhance your performance. The Pro-Grade leg sleeve device hugs your feet, calves, and thighs firmly, loosening up the tight muscles and breaking up stubborn nerve knots. Even with a few hours of use per week, you can expect to see a big difference in your training AND day to day life.

GET BACK ON YOUR FEET - Don’t let work or stress prevent you from doing what you love.

Reduce Pain | Increase Blood Circulation | Move Freely
